revision.comment: Use GZDoom repo instead of ZDoom
revision.text:
The default [[SNDINFO]] depends on the game:
==Doom & Chex Quest== See [https://github.com/ZDoom/gzdoom/blob/master/wadsrc/static/filter/game-doomchex/sndinfo.txt this file].
==Heretic== See [https://github.com/ZDoom/gzdoom/blob/master/wadsrc/static/filter/game-heretic/sndinfo.txt this file].
==Hexen== Most of the definitions are in the Hexen IWAD, see [https://github.com/rheit/zdoom/blob/master/wadsrc/static/filter/game-hexen/sndinfo.txt this file] for the others.
==Strife== See [https://github.com/ZDoom/gzdoom/blob/master/wadsrc/static/filter/game-strife/sndinfo.txt this file].
==Other games== They contain their own SNDINFO lump in their IWAD.
[[Category:Editing references]]
